data.text:
Published 2:26 am Friday, August 2, 2024

At -125, the Boise State Broncos have the best odds to win the MWC in 2024. Peruse the futures odds and other stats below before placing a futures bet.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on Boise State Broncos’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

Boise State Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: -125 (Bet $12.50 to win $10)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 9.5 (Bet $10 to win $11.00 on the over with +110 odds)

Bet on Boise State Broncos futures odds & games on BetMGM.

Boise State 2024 Schedule

Boise State get the 60th-ranked schedule this season (based on its opponents’ combined win total from last year). In 2024, the Broncos will square off against seven teams that had winning records last season, including two that won nine or more games, while facing one squad that notched three or fewer wins a season ago.

Watch Boise State Broncos games all season long on Fubo!
